description: This header file defines a mock class `PersistentStoreImplementationMock` for testing purposes. The class inherits from multiple store-related interfaces such as `IStore`, `IStore2`, `IStoreCache`, `IStoreInspector`, and `IStoreLimit`, and uses Google Mock (`gmock`) to mock their methods for unit testing.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing multiple store interfaces for testing internal store behavior

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification callback in the store

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback in the store

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair in the store with namespace or scope

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value from the store for a given key and namespace or scope

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a specific key in the store

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of an entire namespace in the store

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of keys within a namespace or scope

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of all namespaces within a scope

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage size information for namespaces

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage limit for a namespace

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting storage limit for a namespace
